name: The Realm of the Cosmic Three
name_original: The Realm of the Cosmic Three
description:
You've arrived in The Realm of the Cosmic Three but you're not one of them. 
Or maybe you are and one of the other beings here isn't?
All of these things will change by the time you leave, depending on what you do in this place.

WASD/arrows to move.
Mouse to interact.
